title: Define Project Requirements and Goals
description: Outline the specific features and functionalities of the DreamRecorderAnalyzer, including data collection methods, dream reconstruction algorithms, user interface requirements, and performance metrics.

title: Design DreamDataModel
description: Create a database schema that can efficiently store and manage the brain activity data collected during sleep cycles, as well as any metadata related to dream reconstruction.

title: Develop SleepDataCollector Module
description: Design and implement the hardware module that captures brain activity data during sleep cycles, ensuring compatibility with various user devices.

title: Implement DreamReconstructionAlgorithm
description: Design and implement algorithms that can analyze the collected data to reconstruct visual elements of dreams.

title: Create User Interface Design
description: Design an intuitive user interface that allows users to easily interact with the device, view their dream reconstruction results, and configure settings.

title: Integrate Components and Test Functionality
description: Combine all developed modules and test the DreamRecorderAnalyzer's overall functionality, ensuring it meets project requirements.

title: Document Project Features and Functionality
description: Write clear, concise documentation detailing the DreamRecorderAnalyzer's features, functionality, and usage instructions.

title: Perform Functional Testing on DreamRecorderAnalyzer
description: Test the device's functionality, including data collection, dream reconstruction, and user interface interactions.

title: Address Security Concerns and Enhance Privacy Features
description: Review the device for potential security vulnerabilities and implement necessary measures to protect user data.
